channel.title: ::yell command help please

item.title: ::yell command help please
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

yell("[Donator: "+playerName+"] - " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

I just tried that, it showed up in-game as [Donator: +playername+]: Hello.

item.title: ::yell command help please
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“RuneX-Gaming, post:4, topic:262508”]I’ve tried “[Donator] " + playerName”:".

  • RuneX -[/quote]
    It should be -
("[Donator: +playername+]:  " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell command help please
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

yell("[Donator: +playername+]:  " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

You forgot to make it so it also adds the player name[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2009, 08:10:48 am[/size][hr][quote=“haziq, post:2, topic:262508”]change to this

[quote]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && donator == 1) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Donator]: " + Character.toUpperCaseHolder(text.charAt(4) + text.substring(4)
}[/quote][/quote]

I dont think changing the numbers to a “4” would do anything, he didnt add the +playername+ to the statement.

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell command help please
item.dc:creator: @haziq haziq
item.description:
@haziq wrote:

change to this

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && donator == 1) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("[Donator]: " + Character.toUpperCaseHolder(text.charAt(4) + text.substring(4) }

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell command help please
item.dc:creator: @RuneX-Gaming RuneX-Gaming
item.description:
@RuneX-Gaming wrote:

On my DeltaScape source server, the current yell command for donators is the one i’ve posted below;

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && donator == 1) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("[Donator]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

It shows up in-game, if a player called “Mod Runex” typed “::yell hello”, it would show up as “[Donator]: Hello”.

Can somone please help me to get it so, if a player called “Mod Runex” types “::yell hello”, it would show up as “[Donator] Mod Runex: Hello.”

Thanks for your time,

  • RuneX -

Read full topic
